name: Speed Escape fz
description:
The evil AI AjNet is taking over all robots in the world.

Now you as the last prototype that is still sentient need to find and destroy the AI before it is too late.

However each robot only have a battery life of about 25 seconds so make them count.

Collect bolts, speed run and try to get the best score!

Made for Game Jam by FZ 2021
